reviewText: Just when you think its safe to eat your vegetables, your spaceship is attacked by a giant, disgruntal carrot.  Danger Will Robinson!  If you are a fan of Lost in Space, you will love these episodes.  I actually went looking for these and was quite surprised when I found them.  They are a lot of fun to watch and get nostalgic.  The quality isn't very good, but it wasn't good when it was on TV.  Just sit back and enjoy.
